Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Sketch
B. Diagram
C. Poster
D. Chart
E. Paper
Solution: All others can be drawn on paper.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Mew
B. Howl
C. Bark
D. Grunt
E. Shout
Solution: All except Shout are sounds produced by animals.

Question:

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

B. Hotel
C. Inn

E. Motel
Solution: All except Club are places where people can stay.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

B. Yak

Solution: All except Kangaroo have thick hair or fur on their skin.
